messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Yes, it's area 617.
All right. What's your emergency?
A child has been left on my doorstep.
Okay. What's your address?
It's 90 Newton, Lower Falls.
Okay, how old is the child?
It fits in a small basket.
You would say a baby?
Pardon? Yes, it's a baby.
Okay, when did you notice it?
I just went out to check the temperature outside before I went on an errand. And there was this bassinet with the child in it and a little note.
And what does the note say?
The note says, please take good care of this child.
All right. Is the baby breathing?
Yes, the baby is breathing.
What's your phone number, sir?
It's 617-XXX-XXXX.
All right, I'm going to send an officer over right away. Did you bring the baby inside?
Yes, I brought the baby inside.
Okay, are you there by yourself?
No, my wife is here, but she's ill.
Okay, we'll be right there. Thank you, sir.
Thank you. Bye-bye.
Bye-bye.
